website_summaries.verdict: Superior quality glass meal prep and food storage containers that are freezer, microwave, oven, and dishwasher safe.
pros: One of the most durable food container sets out there
Owners praise the thickness of the glass, ease of use and cleaning, and superior heating quality
Some users feel food tastes better when cooked or heated compared to plastic containers
Holds up to years of use
cons: Occasional cracking or warping of the lids was an issue for some

customer_reviews.title: EXPLODED IN MY MICROWAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Only buy this Pyrex set if you’re David Blaine, because you’ll be eating glass! After owning this set for less than a day, I tried to microwave something at ROOM TEMPERATURE for 60 Seconds, and the container shattered into a million pieces all over the microwave! This is despite the product description that says that the containers are oven and microwave safe. I have owned other Pyrex containers and have microwaved them with no issues, but this one blew up catistrophicaly on the very first use. I enjoy the set, and the look of the product but I cannot stress this enough, IT LITERALLY EXPLODED IN MY MICROWAVE!
customer_reviews.author: tb

customer_reviews.title: It exploded in the microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is not genuine stuff or atleast not what it use to be. This came out of the fridge (not freezer) and went into the microwave for 50 seconds. At 48 seconds it explodes. There is glass everywhere! Little tiny pieces. Took an hour to clean the microwave. I'm going back to plastic. Atleast it won't explode and kill us!
customer_reviews.author: Informed Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous bowls.
customer_reviews.text: Most lids are broken and the bowl rims are chipping after just a few months of use. I contacted the manufacturer regarding this issue and they didn't seem to care at all. There was no concern expressed about the potential for glass being released into food. That, in my mind, is completely unacceptable. There are plenty of other glass bowl manufacturers you should give your business to before buying these!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Exploding pyrex
customer_reviews.text: I would like to thank Amazon customer support for their assistance in the matter was totally satisfied with their solution. Highly disappointed in product. I have been using glass pyrex for over 15 years without issue. In fact until 4/6/18 absolutely no complaints. However less the 3 months after receiving this set one of the glass bowls exploded in my microwave. Reheating food. Very, very disappointed with this Pyrex set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shattered
customer_reviews.text: Microwaved soup for 2 minutes and the glass shattered scaring the crap out of me as soup poured out of the microwave onto the stove. It seemed to have cracked around the line of where the soup line was. I'm not sure why it cracked but it seems that other reviewers have also had this problem. I bought it based on the Pyrex name hoping that they would be somewhat durable. I would not recommend these at all. It's better to buy an inexpensive plastic set that won't break.
customer_reviews.author: David Young

customer_reviews.title: Bowl shattered within seconds of putting food in
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money the bowl shattered upon puttin RICE IN IT. The rice wasn’t ever hot, warm at most. Still shattered and I wasn’t even touching it, filled it with my lunch (rice and meat) and it shattered out of nowhere. Thought this was going to be a better container the standard plastic ones I get. Guess I was wrong
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product. It exploded in the microwave.
customer_reviews.text: I first time I microwaved the boxes. They exploded, It was in the microwave for only 1 minute and 30 seconds. Very tedious to clean the microwave and glass shards. DO NOT BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Raghul S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the covers are very loose and NONE are tight. I JUST started to use these containers. The quality is not nearly what it should be, especially because the set costs 35.00. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex is usually good. Let's see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.text: The package was great and each glass piece was separated from the last. Overall everything came without cracks and in seemingly good condition. However, I noticed a few imperfections... well a few would have been acceptable but I dinged a star because of the fact that most of the pieces had these imperfections. slight chips, bubbles, and suspicious lines similar to hairline cracks... not sure what these are but I cannot feel them when touching the glass. I will wash these and use them a bit before figuring out if they were worth it. Pyrex is usually good quality but I feel they need some QC improvements. The instructions/warnings are helpful for knowing how to microwave, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about other people reporting the glass breaking and I almost didn't buy them! I'm so happy I did and we use them all the time. I treated them so carefully at first. Now these suckers go through the dishwasher, I'll have them with left overs in the fridge and then place them straight into the microwave for reheating. No cracks or explosions! Some of the lids fit a little more snug than others. Also found it weird that some have completely clear glass, but then others have that slight green tint. That doesn't bother at all though. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The bottoms are sturdy enough but the tops are flimsy and do not ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift from my daughter so I will not be returning it. Unfortunately, this is not something I would purchase for myself. The bottoms are sturdy enough but the tops are flimsy and do not secure. Seems kind of silly to make such a flimsy top for something that is supposed to contain and seal food. Good assortment of sizes but would not recommend due to the cheap plastic tops.
customer_reviews.author: Island Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex explodes in the microwave.
customer_reviews.text: One of the two cup containers exploded in my microwave after just a minute. It seems as if Pyrex’s quality has seriously declined if I have to worry about finding shards of it in my Brussels sprouts.
customer_reviews.author: jennie catherine

customer_reviews.title: These are not the Pyrex I know
customer_reviews.text: Something changed with these pyrex containers. I have some from 5 or 6 years ago that are heavy, durable, nice soft rubber lids. This are flimsy and have all sorts of warnings about not putting hot or cold things in them. The lids are a thinner, stiffer plastic. I don't know if these are counterfit, or if the company got bought and they stopped making quality products, or what, but don't expect these to be the good, durable pyrex we all remember.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: LARGER ONES LEAK
customer_reviews.text: Glass quality is excellent, as always with Pyrex. The plastic lids for the larger containers in the set I purchased do not fit tightly and will leak odors and liquids. The smaller containers either have an acceptable seal or they leak if shaken. My only irritation, and reason for two stars, is that they were ADVERTISED on Amazon as airtight. Busy people who have school days fast approaching, don't like to have to return and reorder due to misleading advertisements.
customer_reviews.author: I Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Lids
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to slowly get away from using any plastic container so Pyrex containers serve their purpose perfectly. I always handwash them and never put the lid in the microwave; However, the lids warp after using them for the second time. I hope they sell sturdier lids when these ones break.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Serious defects
customer_reviews.text: Pyrex Simply Store Glass Rectangular and Round Food Container Set I bought the above item from Amazon on Sept. One of the containers (7 cup round) has serious defects as shown in the attached image. I understand I am entitled to expect things I buy to be of acceptable quality. The item I bought does not reach this standard considering the problems I have had. I am therefore asking you for a refund or to replace the item with another in good working order. I trust this matter can be resolved quickly and look forward to your early reply. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Clement

customer_reviews.title: I've had Pyrex glass containers for years
customer_reviews.text: and these are the same as the older ones I had... with nicer colors for the lids. These aren't necessarily going to hold liquids inside if you turn them upsidedown and that seems to bother folks... not me, the lids stay on fine. Never had an issue but if something slips, it's generally just at an angle and I've never had a leak from that. The sizes are wonderful, this is such a nice set. I've dropped them on a harder floor in the kitchen and they've survived. Still a Pyrex fan.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S. Contour

customer_reviews.title: This Pyrex 18 pc set is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of these Pyrex Simply Store Meal Prep Glass Food Storage Containers (18-Piece Set, BPA Free Lids, Oven Safe),Multicolored simply store meal prep containers. I have used these containers: as mixing bowls; to bake casseroles in the 6 cup rectangular piece in a toaster oven, I store leftovers in them and have frozen food/leftovers in them. The lids fit tight and are well constructed. I wash everything in the dishwasher - lids top rack.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Can chip when stacking
customer_reviews.text: Overall we've been very pleased with the Pyrex glass containers. No problems with cracking when going from refrigerator to microwave. The only problem we have found is, if you stack them inside one another for storage they will chip. They are not thick glass like our Pyrex mixing bowls. We have to stack them on top of each other with the lids onto prevent this. you can stack the smaller ones inside the bigger ones with lids on to help save space.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne D

customer_reviews.title: Get the Pyrex!! It will change your life
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with Pyrex!! This was my very first set that I purchased back in 2018. I prefer these over plastic containers since they’re so much more durable! I love that I can also bake items in these dishes as well! None have broken even between 3 moves and countless times dropping them lol. Plus, now I have A LOT more Pyrex added to my kitchen and I absolutely recommend anyone considering Pyrex to definitely get yourself some!! You won’t regret it! Best food storage out there!!
customer_reviews.author: jam ab

customer_reviews.title: Square bowl shattered and lid melted
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend this product. 2 months ago, my square bowl shattered in my cupboard because a small item (not heavy) fell on it. And another time my lid melted in the microwave. They are suppose to be microwave safe. I was not offered a replacement, because I was over 30 days. Buy from a local store, they will return if your not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not like they say
customer_reviews.text: They say microwave save. Obviously they mean the glass only. Reheated on dinner plate setting, shut off after 1st beep. See photo I have had a pyrex bowl with lid for years. Guess it’s true, they don’t make things like they used to. Also, they are not consistently round, do no stack sufficiently
customer_reviews.author: csl

customer_reviews.title: Pure crap
customer_reviews.text: Unmitigated crap. We’ve been using Pyrex glass containers for years. We bought this set to augment our set. WHATEVER YOU DO, DONT STACK THEM! They will be forever fused. We are about to toss these out as they are currently fused together and utterly unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wergeles

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS EXPLODING BOWL
customer_reviews.text: MY husband microwaved a bowl of soup in one of the Bowls and it EXPLODED on our kitchen table. LUCKILY HE WASNT HURT!! The lids are not leak proof they don’t fit properly when I put liquids in the containers and try to put them in the fridge they leak
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey wartinger

customer_reviews.title: No More Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Moving away from plastic containers can be spendy, but this affordable set helped us transition. The glass is thick and durable. The lids fit tightly and have no problem with the dishwasher on the top rack.
customer_reviews.author: alpal

customer_reviews.title: Blasted in the microwave
customer_reviews.text: I microwaved my dinner in the pyrex container for 1min 30sec and it blasted midway. Could have caused serious damage/injury. Do not recommend it to anyone! The container clearly says microwave safe. Have small broken glass spread in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: sonal

customer_reviews.title: Really durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have these one for a while. Actually bought 2 sets of them. Over the time the caps can get a little loose, freezing and heating (microwave) can do that, but they work great for a long period of time. I get replacement caps once a year for the ones I use the most. They are great to make food prep for the week and hold the temperature well, either one (hot or cold).
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: but the lids were a huge disappointment. I received some great Pyrex bowls for my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm refraining from giving this item a higher rating. The glass is ok, but the lids were a huge disappointment. I received some great Pyrex bowls for my wedding years ago and the lids are somewhat of a plastic/rubber combination. They seem much sturdier than these. These lids seem soooo flimsy and cheap. I'm not entirely sure they'll hold any sort of liquid tightly. These lids are much more plastic-y if that makes any sense. I'll update once I've used them for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great package!
customer_reviews.text: Bowls and trays are high quality. Only issue is lids. One of the square lids doesn't like to hold a snug fit. Otherwise very satisfied with this set. I didn't need a 40 piece set. This works great for leftovers of all sorts. Nesting the dishes helps save space. You do have to stack a couple but much better than having an entire cabinet scattered with containers and lids.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy glass storage containers
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be good quality thick tempered glass. The US made bowls in the package had a slight green tint. The others were from Egypt and had a white tint. I don't know if they are different types of glass or not. The lids stay on and fit well. They also stack pretty well. I prefer to store food in glass rather than directly in plastic. These do the job just fine. They seem a little expensive online, but seem worth it once I opened the box and picked one up. They are a bit heavy
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: I like these containers, but...
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely a little concerned when, although none of MY order was broken, my box came with several pieces of broken glass in it. At least 3 pieces of glassware had shards of glass in them. It was unsettling. If I hadn't been paying attention when I was removing things, I could have cut myself. However, as I said, none of mine were broken, everything that was supposed to be there was there, and I'm happy to make the switch from plastic to glass. Here's hoping these last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: THE LIDS ARE TERRIBLE!!! DON'T BUY IF YOU PLAN TO TAKE OUT OF THE HOUSE!
customer_reviews.text: I got this Pyrex set for storing leftovers, meal prepping, and packing lunches. The glass containers themselves are amazing, very sturdy, and super easy to clean. I'm leaving the bad stars because the lids are truly awful. ALL of mine have ripped. I've purchased two sets of these and it's so unfortunate that the lids are such poor quality. Very disappointing because you can't travel with your leftovers to take to work with a leaky/broken lid! So if your leftovers never leave your house this product is for you. If you travel with your leftovers then get the locking lid type here on Amazon. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I guess over the years we have broken a lot of our Pyrex bowls, and my wife started to complain that we didn't have enough to store leftovers/lunch foods. I ordered this package of assorted containers of various sizes and it was perfect for our needs. The set comes with enough variety of sizes that it can package up large or small portions in easily microwaveable bowls that are pretty good at not leaking, too. The lids seal up pretty tightly, so even if they get tipped on their sides, they don't often leak. I like these Pyrex product a lot, as they are very practical and easy to reheat with.
customer_reviews.author: N. BeitlerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Simple, hardy kitchen tool, in sizes that 'nest' together when stored, using minimal space.
customer_reviews.text: These have changed how I manage left overs. I do a better job of managing unused portions of meat, vegetables, sauces and broths now, letting me work more efficiently. There is only one draw back. You need to be careful in the microwave such that the cooling steam in the dish does not pull the warm plastic cover out of shape. So lifting a corner to vent the cover is a really good idea. When you remember to do that the just do what they are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Maneki Neko

customer_reviews.title: Lids Don’t Last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a little over a year and use them occasionally. I typically wash the lids by hand and when they do go in the dishwasher, I always put them on the top shelf, away from the heating element. Nevertheless, many of the lids are cracking wide open at the edges, rendering them far from airtight. Replacement lids are quite expensive and will likely only last a short time as well. I think I’m done with Pyrex.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Lids don't last
customer_reviews.text: The Pyrex containers are great. Lots of different sizes, easy to clean and durable. Unfortunately, the lids just don't last. I'm starting to think they intentionally design them this way so they can keep selling products. If the lids lasted as long as the containers, you could pass them down to your kids and you'd never give the company another dollar. I've bought so many replacement lids, I've lost count. I'm going with a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lids are not microwave safe!
customer_reviews.text: Lids are NOT microwave safe. I should have read the reviews. The lids melt in the microwave. Luckily, my Anchor Hocking bowl are identical in size and their lids will fit (and are microwave safe). Now I'm nervous about the Pyrex bowls shattering in the microwave as well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: SO much better than plastic storage dishes
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but I HATE Tupperware and Rubbermaid-type storage dishes. They are always a mess in the cabinet and they warp or lids get lost. With this, you know for sure the container won't warp. The set is easy to stack keeping the lids with the containers, so it stays neat in your cabinet. I've had these before and am so glad to have them again.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I've never been disappointing with any Pyrex product and this continues to fit that theme. They are leak proof, I've stored broth and soup in them and turned them over and nothing comes out. Super easy to clean as the lid and base are dishwasher safe. They can be frozen or put in the oven or microwave, which is great for meal prepping or storing left overs.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Beats plastic
customer_reviews.text: Finally ditched our plastic storage containers and no serious regrets with these after 10 months with lots of use in the microwave and fridge. No more permanently embedded residue as with plastic. The extra weight of the glass is not an issue. Have to be careful that the lid doesn't seal after removing from the microwave or the softened lid will deform under the vacuum created during cooling. Only problem is a couple of lids have cracked slightly though they are still useable at present. Hopefully Pyrex will continue to supply lids separately.
customer_reviews.author: Moondog

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: I ran a simple test when I received the items and immediately decided to return them. Do not waste your time ordering this product, it is simply NOT leakproof.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgio

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!!! They shatter easy by just touching.
customer_reviews.text: Used them to store some cut up veggies in the fridge. When I took it out of the fridge it shattered in my hand. Glass went everywhere and cut me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great when not sticking together
customer_reviews.text: The bowls are sturdy and look nice. One big problem they can stick together. I cannot separate 2 medium bowls. I’ve looked on internet on how to separate but no positive results. The only thing left is to break one of the bowls. I don’t have the heart to do that. So I use them to prop up plants in containers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: Rectangular pieces not leak proof. Round ones seem to be.
customer_reviews.text: Rectangular pieces are NOT leakproof. The lids on the rectangular pieces fit loose. The lids on the round ones are tighter and those do seem to be leak proof (so far). I compared them to the same item at a local retailer and the same is true. This is a little disappointing because I was hoping to use the rectangular ones to pack lunches.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Arrived chipped
customer_reviews.text: One of the 1 QT glass containers arrived heavily chipped and it is too dangerous to use. It is a pain to send back the heavy package for an exchange, for just one defective container! I wish there is a way to get a replacement for just one container but Amazon won't allow to do so. Annoying to end up like this :(
customer_reviews.author: penguin234

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not the Pyrex quality I’m used to. I suspect counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Order directly from Pyrex instead.
customer_reviews.text: Just noticed one of them was made wrong. The shape is completely off and does not sit/lay on a counter flat.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elly Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: You need these
customer_reviews.text: I use these for all kinds of food storage. Great for fridge and freezer, locks in freshness and prevents strongly-scented foods from stinking up the fridge/freezer. Can be used in microwave and even in the oven(do not put lids in oven...) Does not absorb smells or stains like plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality glassware product.
customer_reviews.text: Pyrex is my favorite glassware product since childhood. It's strong, sturdy, durable, heavy, microwavable, oven safe, and leak proof. It keeps my food freshly stored. I love that it's easy to clean and dishwasher safe. I received my package in excellent condition and packaging. I am very happy with my product.
customer_reviews.author: ExoticAromas

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prep!
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage containers. I love that they don’t discolor and that I can put them in the oven. My only wish is that I would have gotten the partitioned containers as I use them for meal prep. Otherwise, I’m very satisfied. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars for leak proof is because I don’t think I’ve ever tried putting soup in them so I don’t know if it would leak or not. However, I’ve been using them for months now and haven’t had any leak issues with other types of food.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hall

customer_reviews.title: NOT for microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Lids say they are OK to use in microwave but ours warped so we cannot use it any longer. Lids feel cheaper than other Pyrex we've had.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The only containers I like to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I moved into my first house. My roommate brought a different set. When I move again, I'll just get more of these. The various sizes mean you always have the right thing, the lids are easy to match up, they're durable, they're dishwasher safe, they don't leak, they don't stain. I'm going to have to make sure I get them all back when my roommates and I go our separate ways.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gump

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pyrex as expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect storage for leftovers. Lids fit air tight, you can even burp them. The lids even fit some of my older Pyrex. I’ve used them to bake food on my grill and have warmed leftovers in the microwave. Dishwasher, no problem. I have yet to store food in the freezer but expect they’ll be perfect. The variety of sizes are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: After some use, one lid broke
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the variety of sizes but also for the fact that the tops can go in the dishwasher as well unlike the tops of other glass containers. Unfortunately, we have had these for only a little while and one of the kids already cracked with normal use while snapping it on. It’s still functional at this point but I’m hoping this won’t happen with the others..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lids fit well; great sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time now and I’ve gotten rid of all my saved plastic containers. The lids fit well and are easy to open. I have an older set from the famous woman designer cook but the lids on them are so tight they are nearly impossible to open and I have no strength or dexterity issues. These new ones are good sizes and can stack in the fridge and for storage. I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TravelStudent

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have Food Storage Product
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pyrex food storage containers, and I use them all the time. This pyrex set was probably the single most useful gift that my husband and I received for our wedding. They are convenient for storing leftovers or packed lunches because they are microwave-safe, and they are very easy to clean. They don't stain like their plastic counterparts, and after a year and a half of using them, not one of them has broken. I highly recommend this product to anyone. Ditch the dingy plastic Tupperware and get some pyrex!
customer_reviews.author: R&J K

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love Pyrex but I’m very disappointed with this set! The green kids are a different plastic quality than the rest of the set and won’t for it on the glass. These will not keep my food fresh so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Danger Alert: Shattered everywhere without touching
customer_reviews.text: This is a dangerous product. I trusted Pyrex for years but these items came in chipped, and the rest were so brittle to a point where it chattered out of nowhere when it was simply put in the sink. I have small kids and planned on using these for meal prep but I just threw everything away because no one wants to risk our lives eating glass. This should be flagged to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointing lids
customer_reviews.text: These containers are wonderful at the beginning, but then the lids start to not fit right after being washed in the dish washer. I will hand wash the lids that are still working well. The set is nice and for the price you get a lot, but I would suggest that you hand wash the lids from the start or you will be sorely disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Nolte

customer_reviews.title: Nice to see what's inside
customer_reviews.text: Also convenient to be able to reheat food safely in these containers. One note: do not open when cold & just out of the fridge. I did so, and it caused a split in the top on first use. I now know to let dish sit at room temperature for a few minutes to allow the top to warm up before pulling it open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All I heard was good things about these
customer_reviews.text: All I heard was good things about these. So I bought them. I’ve had them for less then a month and one of the lids already comes off. I am unable to trust any of these with liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I found very sharp and small shards of glass among the stored units less than a month in. I then noticed chipped edges on several of these containers. It's unsafe and quite irresponsible to even sell these things. I'm throwing them all away and all the food stored in them as well. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Glass Containers
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved using glass containers over plastic containers. They don't stain or retain odors which is a big plus if you forget how long food has been in the container. Only complaint is over time the lids sometime start crack an rip. I have started hand washing the lids and haven't had that problem anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Dont put lids in the microwave
customer_reviews.text: I wanted glass tupperware for a long time and couldn't pass up these when they went on sale. They are awesome! Only compliant is that it says lids are microwave safe and I used one just sitting on top of the container, not sealed, in the microwave and it ruined the lid.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.B.

customer_reviews.title: pyrex is love..
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item and I was not happy with the rectangle boxes.Their lids don't fit with them.I was so unhappy with this.then I called customer care and they have refund me the lids money. So the people who are having problem,please go for customer care.They are very attentive. The product is very comfortable to use. I will recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nusrat jahan neela

customer_reviews.title: This isn't your mother's Pyrex.
customer_reviews.text: Pyrex is a company with a solid reputation, but their products seem to be in serious decline. I purchased this set and did not receive the high-quality product I expected. The green-lidded, rectangular containers' lids do not fit and leak liquids. Some of the round bowls' lids have not been trimmed and have excess plastic on them around the edges. The pieces which have well-fitting lids work well and have not had any issues in the microwave. However, they become INCREDIBLY hot and I am unable to pick them up without a cloth. Overall, I would suggest looking at other glassware containers for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Much better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how much I would prefer the glass over plastic. Easy storage as they nest within themselves. Easy to clean, and does not emit any chemicals into food. Can use them for baking small amounts - oven proof. I love these containers.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: No measurements on lid, different color glass
customer_reviews.text: The set I got did not have the measurements on the lid as pictured! Is it fake Pyrex? Returned but I still need a set with measurements, how do I get it!? Also some of them were the famous light bluish clear glass and others are just clear glass!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not a 18-piece set.  It is a 9-piece set.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to an 18-piece set. But only received 9 pieces. Went back and looked at the order. It stated 18-piece set, but the picture shows 9-pieces. Have not used them yet. While washing, tried the lids. Most of them are semi-tight, but a couple of them are very loose. The initial disappointment with Amazon's false advertisement was pretty real.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P Luth

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy please buy another type :(
customer_reviews.text: Unsure how this has so many reviews. The lids are faulty because the lines that run across them are weak points. It eventually starts to split on the sides of the lids, essentiaally make the lid worthless...
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex glass storage containers
customer_reviews.text: These Pyrex storage containers are perfect for leftovers that you want to reheat for another meal. They are microwave safe and easy to clean. The different sizes are great. I was able to eliminate some of my plastic storage containers. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The items are fine, minus the one that arrived with a defect that sliced my finger upon reaching into it. It's not a crack, but appears to be actual extra glass. Very sharp extra glass.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Not fake pyrex! Pinky promise!
customer_reviews.text: YES! read a lot of Nash reviews from other vendors but it looks like ive picked the best one! Ive had these for about a month. I've only hand washed them. Havent used in the oven yet but microwaving them went well, even with the lids! Easy to wash and lids fit nice and snug. No spills, chips, cracks or breaks so far! I plan to order again. I also love that the lid tells you how much the container holds (example: 3 cups) so I'm not trying to put too much or too little amounts of food in them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hampton

customer_reviews.title: I wish that I knew about these sooner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these containers and so much better than plastic, particularly since I have been working from home recently. I prefer leftovers warmed up in the oven and these go straight from the refrigerator (without plastic lid) to the oven. I don't even have to scrub them after use, my dishwasher does all the work. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the lids
customer_reviews.text: I must say I am disappointed with this Pyrex set. I bought this mainly for transporting and reheating up foods for work. The lids do not stay on well at all. When I carry my oatmeal to work in these I have to put in a separate bag because it leaks all over. The cheaper anchor brand from Walmart work much better and seal tight. Other than the lids this is a nice set and they microwave well directly from the fridge to microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny D

customer_reviews.title: I love these, you put food in them even pasta ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these, you put food in them even pasta sauce, they don't stain like plastic. I also use them when I feed the cat a half can of food, I put the other half in one of these and put the lid on and put it in the refrigerator. I use to leave in the can with the lid on and the cat wouldn't eat it, but I guess in these it stays fresher. They also stack on each other so there is more space in the refrigerator. Rocky
customer_reviews.author: Louis Leonardis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like that the lids are colored based on size and that the lid has the cups measurements on each one so you know if your bowl is 5 cups vs. 7 cups etc. it helps me calculate and visualize quantities. I wish they nested inside each other better which would make stacking and storing MUCH easier. I took the advice of other reviewers and always hand wash the lids and they have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for mom for Christmas she absolutely loves them! They don’t stain like her old containers did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SAME DAY DELIVERY AND EXPLOSION.  AVOID.
customer_reviews.text: Microwave safe? It exploded 30 seconds in the microwave. Just had it delivered today. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long term review
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought another set of these because we have lost some over time. The glass is awesome, never chipped and is very strong. My only issue is with the lids. After a little while, they tear and liquids leak out. We need to buy a few each year.
customer_reviews.author: Off Brand Dad

customer_reviews.title: Seal the box shut....
customer_reviews.text: Box showed up open, with dirt inside the broken containers. Glass all over the inside of the box. i threw the entire thing out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Don't wash the covers with hot water
customer_reviews.text: The plastic covers are easy to expand or change shapes after cleaning with the hot water, which made me disappointed. Because some of them are actually having leak problems after the covers being expanded. I wish I hadn't washed them with hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good containers
customer_reviews.text: Good glass containers for food prep or leftover storage. Had an older set (5yo?) where the lids were starting to crack and not seal well. It was going to cost almost as much to replace just the lids as to get this full set!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna P.

customer_reviews.title: Lids crack :(
customer_reviews.text: Loved these containers because I don’t like using plastic. That’s being said, the plastic lids are starting to crack. I HANDWASH all my lids, and let them air dry. Can’t believe they’re cracking like this. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M.

customer_reviews.title: Soft lids
customer_reviews.text: Would have rated as a 5, but the lids seem a little cheaper than the container lids when bought at the store. We did get a really good deal (sale) so no complaints. Plus we don't microwave the lids so it's not a huge deal. They did make it through the dishwasher and that's what was important for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s fine except it came shattered into pieces! The moment I picked up the box I knew, I could hear the jingling and thought to myself, that’s not good! Ugh so frustrating! Due to the quarantine I won’t be able to return it,sadly! So I guess I’m stuck with this!
customer_reviews.author: deborah a plaza

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls lids will tear eventually
customer_reviews.text: Great product I only bought because i needed lids for my existing bowls, it was cheaper to buy this set than to just buy replacement lids. My only issue is I was missing a orange lid and had an extra blue one when i received my package not a big problem
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to brand for a while now. These are probably best used to store food in fridge, not for bringing to lunch like I do because they can leak! But I highly recommend for their quality and convenient sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: It's Pyrex. What else needs to be said.
customer_reviews.text: As my title states. It's Pyrex. They just know what they're doing. Great product, great feel to the glass and rubber. Great secure feel when lid is on. My wife makes my lunch everyday and I look forward to grabbing my Pyrex to hear up whatever she gave me. Additional note: You know you've purchased a great product when you accidentally leave your Pyrex in a work refrigerator to check days later and it's gone. Thank you Pyrex for being a name I can trust without having to think about another brand. Please keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this brand
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, you cannot beat Pyrex ! I made the mistake of buying off-brand to save money, those are in the garbage. Lids fit perfectly. Glass is the best material for leftovers, does not stain, can be microwaved, last much longer, better for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE DUGGAN

customer_reviews.title: Good glass storage set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good glass food storage set. Purchased this to supplement a set already owned. The containers are holding up well, and are leak proof. Don’t use the lids in the microwave as the heat from the cooking food will warp them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I hope the lids last longer than my last set.
customer_reviews.text: I really like Pyrex, but the lids on my last set cracked all up, but I had them for a long time. I was trying to just replace the lids, but they were so expensive to replace, so I just bought another set instead.
customer_reviews.author: gayle

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. I replaced all my plastic containers. They don't stain. They're dishwasher safe. I feel like they are safer than plastic in the microwave. The rectangle containers for perfectly in my lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Rectangle ones leak/lids not microwave safe!
customer_reviews.text: First day using them and brought my lunch in the smaller rectangle one and it leaked! Very annoyed. Are these knock off Pyrex?? Update: the lids are NOT microwave safe, despite them saying they are... see pic.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Essential product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how people function without Pyrex. These containers are fantastic for leftovers, for baking smaller dishes in the oven, and I can't see how people function without them. They rinse up clean, don't stain like plastic, and are super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maxie Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great USA made product
customer_reviews.text: So sick of plastic. These are great for storage and don't hold doors. If you use microwave, can go from fridge to there without melted disgusting plastics. AND:MADE IN USA
customer_reviews.author: Jan Padavic

customer_reviews.title: lids crack
customer_reviews.text: After two years of light use and top-rack dishwasher washing, the lids are all cracking. Now I have to pay $20 to replace the lids. None of my other storage containers have this problem. It's nice Pyrex offers a 2-year warranty, but I'm just outside the time period so I'm out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybean

customer_reviews.title: Love my Pyrex dishes
customer_reviews.text: Love my Pyrex dishes. Wanted to purchase these at my local Target for a Black Friday special, but was happy to see Amazon had the same set for cheaper! They all arrived in great shape and none were damaged or broken. Also I noticed some comments stating the lids didn't seal that well, and I just wanted to say mine fit like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Beach

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought these years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. Keeps food incredibly fresh and organized in the fridge. Great way to see what’s in there..no mystery surprises with food going bad! Perfect for packing lunch as well. Would have given 5 stars except that the lids for the small rectangular pieces fit a little loose. Not snug like the round ones. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: My favorite glass containers with lids!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite glass containers with lids that I’ve ever purchased - and I’ve purchased a few. This is my second set of this particular brand. They last long, are easy to clean, have a great seal that actually stays on tightly. I also love the variety of sizes and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: All for Him

product_meta.title: Pyrex Simply Store Meal Prep Glass Food Storage Containers (18-Piece Set, BPA Free Lids, Oven Safe),Multicolored
product_meta.description: Style Name:18 pc setThese versatile glass dishes have color-coded airtight lids for easy organizing in pantry, fridge or freezer. Durable, pure Pyrex glass stands up to the microwave and dishwasher use after use, and because it’s stain and odor resistant, it stays clean and preserves your food’s fresh flavors. This set includes (1) 1-Cup Round Glass Storage Containers with Lids, (1) 6-Cup Rectangular Glass Storage Containers with Lids, and (1) 7-Cup Round Glass Storage Containers with Lids, (2) 2-Cup Round Glass Storage Containers with Lids, (2) 4-Cup Round Glass Storage Containers with Lids and (2) 3-Cup Rectangular Glass Storage Containers with Lids.
feature_bullets: Includes (1) 1-Cup Round Glass Storage Containers with Lids, (1) 6-Cup Rectangular Glass Storage Containers with Lids, and (1) 7-Cup Round Glass Storage Containers with Lids, (2) 2-Cup Round Glass Storage Containers with Lids, (2) 4-Cup Round Glass Storage Containers with Lids and (2) 3-Cup Rectangular Glass Storage Containers with Lids
Durable high-quality tempered glass is dishwasher, freezer, microwave and preheated oven safe
Nonporous glass won’t absorb food odors, flavors, or stains
BPA free secure-fit plastic lids are freezer, microwave and top-rack dishwasher safe
2-year limited warranty on glass and plastic lids

Solve your storage with this multi-size set of glass dishes for fridge or freezer, with airtight lids. Pure Pyrex glass stands up to the microwave and dishwasher use after use, and because it’s stain- and odor-resistant, it stays clean and preserves your food’s fresh flavors.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,564 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
